titleStmt.title: Symptomes of growth & decay to godlinesse in LX. signs of a living and dying Christian. With the causes of decay, and remedies for recovery. / By Francis Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Francis, fl. 1657-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dawson, for F.S. at the Elephant and Castle, near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Signs of a dying Christian.
Initial imprimatur page: William Jeffery, Benjamin Morley, Thomas Munck, Joseph Wright.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
